label: 祇園臨時祭
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A special Shintō festival at the Gion-no-yashiro.  [It] was helf for the first time [in 1124 (Tenji 1), [and] was made an annual festival.  This special festival...was observed annually on the fifteenth day of the sixth lunar month, the day following the Gion no goryō-e, one of the great Kyoto annual festivals, held at this same shrine (Part A, p. 379). [祇園社、祇園御霊会]
